title: Worry less
description: We take the complexity out of deploying your backend functions in a serverless environment and we give you 24/7 smart scaling and monitoring.

title: Save time
description: Write functions in your favorite language, Javascript, Swift, Kotlin and we will give you a toold to move them seamlessly to be ececuted in the cloud.

title: Save power
description: Move energy hungry processing in the cloud while measuring the power used with every deploy.  Save power as fucntions only run when they are needed to run.
